roleset.name: (cause to) be filled
roleset.note: BULGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bulge' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from bulge.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: with Arg2
example.text: The tattered black binder , bulging with 18 years ' worth of recipes held [*] together by rubber bands , was in chef Lindsey Shere 's purse when it was stolen [*-113]from her house recently [*T*-2] .
example.arg: with 18 years ' worth of recipes held [*] together by rubber bands

example.name: Medical example, with source as Arg1
example.text: This problem is caused due to the bulging of a disc from one of the spinal crevices.
example.arg: from one of the spinal crevices
